songs.title: All These Bands
songs.lyrics:
[HOOK]
D block be my clan
Push nigga we ain't playing
D block be my clan
Pussy nigga we ain't playing
Back in the club we in
Young niggas eating
I got all these bands x4

[L'a Capone]
D block be my clan Pussy  nigga we ain't playing
Back in the club we in Young niggas eating
You dudes are pretend 60th  is my land
BOA come in
Bank america come in Everybody with free bands
Everbody get free bands
Don't care what you saying We finesse gang
Wo thang up my ass
D Block be my clan. Pussy nigga we ain't playin
D block be my clan. Pussy nigga, we ain't playin
Back of the club we in
Young niggas eatin'
[Chorus]
Bands, I got all these bands. I got all these bands. I got all these (x4)
